subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: There were no promises from Hideki Matsui, not with his left wrist under a thick cast in a sling. But Matsui, the Yankees' left fielder who broke his wrist last Thursday, made it clear that he did not consider his season over.
snippet: There were no promises from Hideki Matsui, not with his left wrist under a thick cast in a sling. But Matsui, the Yankees' left fielder who broke his wrist last Thursday, made it clear that he did not consider his season over.
